page.title: 20ALDERLEY EDGE C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: The school was opened in{1855}and is now classed as a{listed building.}It was originally a middle school. The present number on roll is{170. There are{6 teachers and a Head at the present moment but due to cut backs this is going to be reduced to {5. There are{4 junior classes,}which will be reduced to{3,}and{2 infant. The curriculum is wide catering for all children,but the basic subjects are not neglected. It is a happy school which takes children from{Alderley,}and the surrounding district.
